  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Integral indefinida</string>
            <string language="en">Indefinite integral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unbestimmtes Integral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intégrale indéfinie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Integral indefinida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Integrale indefinito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αόριστο ολοκλήρωμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de integral indefinida. Se estudia su definición y sus propiedades, en particular la linealidad de la integración indefinida. Se introduce el cálculo de primitivas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses visuals to explain the concept of indefinite integral. It studies the definition and properties of integration, especially the property of linearity. The calculus of primitives is introduced.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">integral indefinida</string>
            <string language="en">indefinite integral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primitiva</string>
            <string language="en">primitive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">linealidad</string>
            <string language="en">linearity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">integral</string>
            <string language="en">integral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Sichtbarmachungen, das Konzept des unbestimmten Integrals zu 
erklären. Es studiert die Definition und die Eigenschaften der 
Integration, besonders die Eigenschaft von den Linearitäten. 
Das Kalkül der Primitiver wird eingeführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
visuels d'expliquer le concept de l'intégrale indéfinie. Elle 
étudie la définition et les propriétés de l'intégration, 
particulièrement la propriété des linéarités. Le calcul des
primitifs est présenté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos visuals explicar o 
conceito da integral indefinida. Estuda a definição e as 
propriedades da integração, especial a propriedade das linearidades.
O cálculo dos primitivos é introduzido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi rappresentazioni 
spiegare il concetto dell'integrale indefinito. Studia la 
definizione e le proprietà di integrazione, particolarmente la 
proprietà delle linearità. Il calcolo dei primitivi è 
introdotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τα visuals για 
να εξηγήσει την έννοια του αόριστου ολοκληρώματος. Μελετά 
τον καθορισμό και τις ιδιότητες της ολοκλήρωσης, ειδικά η 
ιδιοκτησία της γραμμικότητας. Ο υπολογισμός των πρωτόγονων 
εισάγεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unbestimmtes Integral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ursprünglich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Linearitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">integral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intégrale indéfinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">primitif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéarités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">integral indefinida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">primitivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linearidades</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">função</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">integrale indefinito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">primitivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αόριστο ολοκλήρωμα</string>

          </keyword>
